name: A DOSE OF BUCKLEY: WTSF SWEATERS
description:
You asked for it. We provide it. The WTSF shirt is available for you Buckley fans again. Angry humour from an angry man made available by two happy dudes at TTOFS. 

This is a Pre sale only. 

Orders will be processed, printed, and shipped within 7 business days of your order. There is NO guarantee that your order will arrive in time for Christmas. We have seen some international orders held up at their countires customs department for 6 weeks, so there is NO gurantees on shipping time, except that it will be shipped no later than 7 busy days from when you place your order. 

Are we out of stock of something? Doesn't come in YOUR size? 
Email us and let us have it!!!! shoutout@ttofs.com 

UNISEX CREW NECKS PRINTED ON: 
9.3 oz 50% cotton/50% dryblend polyester fleece, preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. Body Width: S=20", M=22", L=24", XL=26", 2XL=28", 3XL=30"

It's better than any other wrestling t-shirt: it's the official TTOFS/BOTCHAMANIA t-shirt!

Thrust into battle, you have to have eyes in the back of your head and be everywhere at once. This uniform allows maximum flexibility when wielding a cross-bow. No one is safe.

Please follow our washing/drying instructions accordingly...unless it's covered in brains; in that case YOU ARE ON YOUR OWN!

Part of a balanced breakfast, lunch and maybe even dinner, this action packed cereal could provide enough energy to power the Death Start for weeks!

But wait, THERE'S MORE: Each box of Boba Berry contains a free toy.

Being a Bounty Hunter has never been so good!

name: BLUE ICE
description:
From the brain of Mister White, to the production/cooking of Mr. J. Pinkman comes BLUE ICE: Albuquerque's tastiest and most sought after form of....METH!?!!?!?

This product has caused mental and physical harm to many, most resulting in death, but TTOFS braved the perils of the seedy drug underbelly to bring you this exclusive tee.

TTOFS doesn't condone usage of Meth, but come on; look at how cool that logo looks. If this was a real product, the look alone is enough to hook you.

But please say NO to drugs and YES to this t-shirt!

name: JAWS
description:
To Noel (1 half of TTOFS):

This shirt is based on a huge monolgue from JAWS. That's the text I planned on using when you said you had an idea for a JAWS shirt.

So to paste it in here again is really monotonous and insults the intelligence of those reading it.

haha not really, but to me, feels better this way!

EVERYTHING you need to know is embedded in the shirt. Look left and have a quick once-over! You won't be let down!

LOVE,

Steve


Are we out of stock of something? Doesn't come in YOUR size? 
Email us and let us have it!!!! shoutout@ttofs.com

name: WET BANDITS
description:
The following is what you will learn from the Official Wet Bandits Criminal Mastermind Manual:

-How to wield a crowbar
-Properly clogging the drain after robbing a dwelling, thus flooding the house.
-Kids are afraid of the dark (also, the park)
-Just who in the hell 'Snakes' is
-Even gold teeth aren't permanent 
-Santie Clause doesn't visit the funeral home (little buddy)
-How to anticipate automatic timers
-To avoid taking off your shoes in a house/getting tarred and feathered

name: MACHETE KILLS
description:
Everyone favorite ex-Mexican Federale agent -  Machete stopped by the Thread Quarters to "persuade" Steve and Noel to make a shirt to fund his exploits and misadventures.

How could we turn him down? 

Have you seen the size of his Machete?

It's big. 

And sharp. 

So we obliged.*

Eventually obliged. Noel, fueled only by sugar-free energy drinks and microwaved spring rolls, tempted fate and got in Machete's grill and started running his mouth. Machete, un phased, simply looked eyes with Noel and eloquently uttered the phrase, "Shut your gate, hombre." And yadda yadda yadda, we made the shirt!

PRINTED ON BLACK:
UNISEX: 4.3 oz 100% Combed Ring spun Cotton. Super-soft, lightweight, slim-fit tee, preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. Body Width: XS=16", S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24", 2XL=26"

name: MONSTROSI-TEES: BRAIN-A-HOLICS ANONYMOUS
description:
Dearest t-shirt goer: We know EXACTLY what you are thinking when feasting your eyes on this EXCLUSIVE t-shirt shirt: "How the fudge did they get that many zombies together so the amazing Brit Zombie Girl could sketch them without being torn to shreds?" It wasn't easy but we at TTOFS will stop at nothing to provide the best, most brain-eatingest t-shirt ever created! Rest assured, our brains remain intact, so please, we urge you to enjoy this shirt in all of its inconic glory, guilt free! Love always, Noel and Steve - TTOFS xoxoxoxoxo Are we out of stock of something? Doesn't come in YOUR size? Email us and let us have it!!!! shoutout@ttofs.com PRINTED ON: UNISEX: 4.3 oz 100% Combed Ring spun Cotton. Super-soft, lightweight, slim-fit tee, preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. name: DON OF THE DEAD
description:
Well, the worst has happened. The sewers are too full. The mutated now walk the earth in search of brains!

These re-animated amphibians will treat you like the Foot Clan and devour your insides effortlessly, as if it were pizza.

These 'party dudes' no longer shout "COWABUNGA'; that has been replaced with inaudible snarling and growling.

Shredder has been shredded within seconds.

Krang was swallowed whole as he is ALL BRAIN!

Even Splinter can no longer control them as they ripped him apart fast than a kid opening the Turtle Van for Christmas!

But fear not...they did save April...for dessert!

This is it.

This is the end.

This is the...DON OF THE DEAD!

Designed by the awesome Custom Couture!
(http://www.customcouture.ca)

Are we out of stock of something? Doesn't come in YOUR size? 
Email us and let us have it!!!! shoutout@ttofs.com

8.5oz 100 % cotton tubular unisex pre-shrunk jersey. Body width: 3XL=28", 4XL=30", 5XL=32"

name: [JUSTICE] LEAGUE OF THE DEAD!
description:
These heroes aren't fighting for truth.

They aren't fighting for justice.

They aren't even fighting to uphold the power of good...

Instead, they are fighting for the consumption of flesh, eyeballs and braaaaiiiinnnns!!!

No villain can thwart their attempts.

Kryptonite has been rendered useless.

No one can talk sense into these monsters! The ones who tried had their skin ripped from their bones and their brains feasted upon!!!

There is only ONE way to keep these creatures at bay: fork over $12 for THIS shirt!!!


Are we out of stock of something? Doesn't come in YOUR size?

name: MONSTROSI-TEES: PENNYWISE
description:
Timothy Curry is the man. He is an actor of true talent; no role is too great or whacky for him to portray. From the cross-dressing delight of The Rocky Horror Picture Show, to the mega baddie Kilo Khan in Super Human Samurai Syber Squad (remember that show?!?!) to the menacing Plaza Hotel Manager in Home Alone 2, Curry can do it all. But perhaps it was his portrayal of the evil clown Pennywise that haunted the lives of John Ritter and co. in Stephen King's IT that he may best remembered for! Now is your chance to own this exclusive portrait t-shirt and show your undying love and support for T to the C!!! TEAM CURRY FO LYFE!!! Are we out of stock of something? Doesn't come in YOUR size? Email us and let us have it!!!! orders@ttofs.com UNISEX PRINTED ON: 4.3 oz 100% Combed Ringspun Cotton. Lightweight, slim fit, super-soft, preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. Body Width: XS=16", S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24", 2XL=26", 8.5oz 100 % cotton tubular unisex pre-shrunk jersey. Body width: 3XL=28", 4XL=30", 5XL=32"

A collaboration with Britzombiegirl Art.
